section.body:
His colour-explosive art pieces combine millions of dots meticulously placed over countless hours on black paper with gel pens. Each of his hand drawn art pieces takes approximately a month to finish. 

[Art by Jin](https://jindotart.com/)

[Cosmic Sunset by Jin](https://jindotart.com/product/cosmic-sunset/)

title: Why does the site look this way?
description: Psychedelic pointillism and photos of The Alps
